TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 为系统中所有面向通信的对象（包括通道、通道管理器、工厂、侦听器以及调度程序和服务主机）定义基本状态机的协定。

span.span: Defines the contract for the basic state machine for all communication-oriented objects in the system, including channels, the channel managers, factories, listeners, and dispatchers, and service hosts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口定义：The interface defines: - 一组用于启动状态转换的打开、关闭和中止方法：A set of open, close and abort methods for initiating state transitions: - - - - 打开和关闭方法的异步版本：Asynchronous versions of the open and close methods: - - - - - 一组提供状态转换通知的事件：A set of events that provide notifications of state transitions: - - - - - - 一个用于检查对象状态的公共 属性A common property for inspecting the state of an object

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Abort() cil managed

summary.span: 使通信对象立即从其当前状态转换到关闭状态。

span.span: Causes a communication object to transition immediately from its current state into the closed state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法指示在返回之前应忽略或意外终止任何未完成的工作。This method indicates that any unfinished work should be ignored or ungracefully terminated before returning. 方法可用于取消任何未处理的操作，包括对 的未处理的调用。The method can be used to cancel any outstanding operations, including outstanding calls to . 若要使 从 状态正常转换到 状态，请调用 。To gracefully transition an from the state to the state call .

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作以关闭通信对象。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使 从 状态正常转换到 状态。This method causes an to gracefully transition from the state to the state. 提供了有显式超时和没有显式超时两个版本。Versions with and without an explicit timeout are provided.

span.span: The delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.

param.span: 一个由应用程序指定的对象，它包含与异步关闭操作相关联的状态信息。

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作以关闭通信对象。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.
The that references the asynchronous close operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使 从除 状态之外的任意状态正常转换到 状态。This method causes an to gracefully transition from any state, other than the state to the state. 使用 方法，可在返回之前完成所有未完成的工作。The method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning. 例如，完成所有缓冲的消息的发送）。For example, finish sending any buffered messages).

exception.span: 在 能够正常关闭之前所经过的默认超时。

span.span: The default timeout elapsed before the was able to close gracefully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使 在指定的时间间隔内从除 状态之外的任意状态正常转换到 状态。This method causes an to gracefully transition from any state, other than the state to the state with in a specified interval of time. 使用 方法，可在返回之前完成所有未完成的工作。The method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning. 例如，完成所有缓冲的消息的发送）。For example, finish sending any buffered messages).

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使 进入 状态，并在它转换到 状态完成或失败之前，会保持此状态。The method causes an to enter into the state where it remains until its transition to the state is completed or fails. 提供了有显式超时和没有显式超时两个版本。Versions with and without an explicit timeout are provided.

span.span: The delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous open operation.

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to open a communication object.
The that references the asynchronous open operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例化 时，它以 状态开始。When an is instantiated, it begins in the state. 在处于 状态时，可以配置此对象（例如，可以设置属性或注册事件），但仍不能用此对象发送或接收消息。In the state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages. 方法使 进入 状态，且在打开操作成功、打开操作超时或失败以及对象出错或 中止之前，它会保持该状态。The method causes an to enter into the state where it remains until the open operation succeeds, the open operation times out or fails and the object becomes faulted, or the is aborted. 在处于 状态时， 可用（例如，可以接收消息），但不能再对它进行配置。In the state, the is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable.

exception.span: 无法打开并且已进入 状态。

span.span: The was unable to be opened and has entered the state.

exception.span: 在 （已经进入 状态）能够进入 状态之前所经过的默认打开超时。

span.span: The default open timeout elapsed before the was able to enter the state and has entered the state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例化 时，它以 状态开始。When an is instantiated, it begins in the state. 在处于 状态时，可以配置此对象（例如，可以设置属性或注册事件），但仍不能用此对象发送或接收消息。In the state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages. 方法使 进入 状态，且在打开操作成功、打开操作超时或失败以及对象出错或 中止之前，它会保持该状态。The method causes an to enter into the state where it remains until the open operation succeeds, the open operation times out or fails and the object becomes faulted, or the is aborted. 在处于 状态时， 可用（例如，可以接收消息），但不能再对它进行配置。In the state, the is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable.

span.span: Causes a communication object to transition from its current state into the closed state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使 从 状态正常转换到 状态。This method causes an to gracefully transition from the state to the state. 使用 方法，可在返回之前完成所有未完成的工作。The method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning. 例如，完成所有缓冲的消息的发送）。For example, finish sending any buffered messages). 进入 状态，并在转换为 状态之前保持此状态。The enters the state and remains in it until the transition to the state is completed. 到达 状态后，立即返回 。 returns once the state is reached. 如果在 能够正常关闭之前经过了默认关闭超时，则中止 。If the default close timeout elapses before the is able to close gracefully, the is aborted. 如果对处于 、 或 状态的 调用了 ，则中止 。If is called on an in the , , or state, the is aborted. 如果对处于 或 状态的 调用了 ，则调用立即返回。If is called on an in the or state, the call returns immediately. 还有一个关闭方法的异步版本，该方法可通过调用 来启动并通过调用 来完成。There is also an asynchronous version of the close method that is initiated by calling and completed by calling .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Open() cil managed

summary.span: 使通信对象从已创建状态转换到已打开状态。

span.span: Causes a communication object to transition from the created state into the opened state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例化 时，它以 状态开始。When an is instantiated, it begins in the state. 在处于 状态时，可以配置此对象（例如，可以设置属性或注册事件），但仍不能用此对象发送或接收消息。In the state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages. 方法使 进入 状态，且在打开操作成功、打开操作超时或失败以及对象出错或 中止之前，它会保持该状态。The method causes an to enter into the state where it remains until the open operation succeeds, the open operation times out or fails and the object becomes faulted, or the is aborted. 在处于 状态时， 可用（例如，可以接收消息），但不能再对它进行配置。In the state, the is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable. 还有一个打开方法的异步版本，该方法可通过调用 来启动并通过调用 来完成。There is also an asynchronous version of the open method that is initiated by calling and completed by calling .

exception.span: 无法打开并且已进入 状态。

span.span: The was unable to be opened and has entered the state.

exception.span: 在 （已经进入 状态）能够进入 状态之前所经过的默认打开超时。

span.span: The default open timeout elapsed before the was able to enter the state and has entered the state.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property State As CommunicationState
public: property System::ServiceModel::CommunicationState State { System::ServiceModel::CommunicationState get(); };

summary.span: 获取面向通信的对象的当前状态。

span.span: Gets the current state of the communication-oriented object.
The value of the of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于 的主通信状态有：The main communication states available to an are: - - - 当在前三个主状态之间转换时，这类对象还可能处于下列两个暂时状态下：There are also transitory states that such an object can occupy when transitioning between the first three main states: - - 此 定义对系统中所有面向通信的对象（包括通道、侦听器、通道和侦听器工厂以及 类）都有效的状态。This defines the states that are valid for all communication-oriented objects in the system, including channels, listeners, the channel and listener factories, and the class.
